statements: SELECT * FROM documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, created_by FROM documents WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content FROM documents WHERE created_at < '2022-01-15' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM documents WHERE created_by = 'Alice' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, title, content FROM documents WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, title, created_by, created_at FROM documents;
SELECT title, content FROM documents WHERE created_by = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM documents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM documents WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' AND created_by = 'Bob';
SELECT DISTINCT created_by FROM documents;
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT document_name, created_by, created_at FROM documents WHERE created_by = 'Alice';
SELECT document_name, created_by FROM documents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT document_name, created_by FROM documents WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_name, collaborator_name FROM documents JOIN document_collaborators ON documents.document_id = document_collaborators.document_id WHERE collaborator_name = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_name = 'Example Document'
SELECT document_name, created_by FROM documents WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT document_name, content FROM documents WHERE created_by = 'Alice' AND created_at >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT document_name, collaborator_name FROM documents JOIN document_collaborators ON documents.document_id = document_collaborators.document_id WHERE document_name LIKE '%Report%'
SELECT document_name, joined_at FROM documents JOIN document_collaborators ON documents.document_id = document_collaborators.document_id WHERE collaborator_name = 'Bob'
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT id, title FROM documents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, content FROM documents WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at < '2022-05-01';
SELECT document_id, user_id, permission_type FROM document_permissions ORDER BY document_id, user_id ASC;
SELECT title, content FROM documents WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT d.title, u.username, dp.permission_type FROM documents d JOIN document_permissions dp ON d.id = dp.document_id JOIN users u ON u.id = dp.user_id WHERE dp.permission_type = 'read';
SELECT u.username, d.title, dp.permission_type FROM users u JOIN document_permissions dp ON u.id = dp.user_id JOIN documents d ON d.id = dp.document_id WHERE u.email LIKE '%example.com%';

SELECT d.title, u.username, dp.permission_type FROM documents d LEFT JOIN document_permissions dp ON d.id = dp.document_id LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = dp.user_id WHERE dp.permission_type = 'write' OR dp.permission_type IS NULL ORDER BY u.username ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM documents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, content FROM documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT document_id, user_id, permission_level FROM collaborations WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT comment FROM comments WHERE document_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM documents WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5 AND created_at < '2022-05-01';
SELECT document_id, user_id, permission_level FROM collaborations WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT document_id, user_id, comment FROM comments WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY document_id, created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT doc_name, created_date FROM documents ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, message FROM team_members JOIN notifications ON team_members.member_id = notifications.recipient_id;
SELECT edit_id, edit_content, edit_time FROM edits WHERE editor_id = 3 ORDER BY edit_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE member_id > 3 ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT doc_name, created_date FROM documents WHERE doc_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, edit_content FROM team_members JOIN edits ON team_members.member_id = edits.editor_id WHERE edit_time >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY edit_time;
SELECT doc_name, message FROM documents JOIN notifications ON documents.doc_id = notifications.doc_id WHERE recipient_id = 5 AND sent_time < '2022-09-01';
